Multilingual LCZ4r-QGIS Plugin

Max Anjos

December 31, 2024

Source: vignettes/examples.Rmd
examples.Rmd
Introduction to LCZ4r-QGIS plugin

A LCZ4r-QGIS plugin repository that integrates the LCZ4r package with QGIS in multiple languages. It facilitates the integration of the General Functions and Local Functions from LCZ4r package into QGIS, allowing users to analyze Local Climate Zones (LCZ) and urban heat islands directly within the QGIS environment.

Source
Installing LCZ4r in QGIS

You can watch a detailed tutorial on installing LCZ4r in QGIS above or link below

O plugin LCZ4r-QGIS integra as Funções Gerais e as Funções Locais do pacote LCZ4r no ambiente QGIS.

Nível de tradução: Humano

Autor(es): Max Anjos, Antônio Neto, Dayvid Medeiros

বাংলা - প্লাগইন ডাউনলোড করুন

স্থানীয় জলবায়ু অঞ্চল (LCZ) এবং শহুরে তাপ দ্বীপ বিশ্লেষণ QGIS-এ!

LCZ4r-QGIS প্লাগইন LCZ4r প্যাকেজের সাধারণ এবং স্থানীয় কার্যকারিতা QGIS পরিবেশে একত্রিত করে।
